meaningMnemonic: You're <radical>loiter</radical>ing, staring down at the <radical>cross</radical> that got caught in the <radical>net</radical> of your <radical>heart</radical>, because it's trying to teach you to act with <kanji>virtue</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: As you try to decide if you want to live a life of <kanji>virtue</kanji> the ghost of <reading>Toku</reading>gawa (とく) Ieyasu appears before you. He points to your heart and the cross, then points to his own and you see a glowing cross in his own.
